name: Terms & Conditions
description:
Terms & Conditions is a short experimental experience about internet services, spam, ads, mails and madness.

Agree to all Terms and Conditions, but be mindful of your data, spam and scammers.

This prototype was created in the Specialization Game Design at the Zurich University of the Arts (ZHdK).

Features
  • Control a mouse like never before: with your keyboard
  • Witness a bizarre 3D rendition of a familiar 2D interface
  • Get immersed in the awful atmosphere
  • Survive 3 levels of spam-driven madness
